Index >  BlankImageMaxStdDev

BlankImageMaxStdDev

Description

Returns or sets the deviation of the pixels in an image.

Data type

<float>

Syntax

.BlankImageMaxStdDev = 50;

Description

The allowed values are from 0 to 100. 0 means it is a single-color image. The default value is 1.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

This property is only valid before IsBlankImageExpress is called.

See also

BlankImageCurrentStdDev
BlankImageThreshold
IsBlankImageExpress
